body: I feel upset that Go still keep pointers, perhaps to better integrate with C ? However, issue like this could be solved elegantly if Go could take Java's approach, reference types (not exact the reference in C++, more like Java's) for all non-primitive types (including struct). Nothing offense, but as a Go developer, I was bitten several times by interface, struct and pointer... Well, you can blame me as I am an inexperience Go developer...
